    • Uses of Controller in tech.lity.rea.skatolo.gui.controllers

      Subclasses of Controller in tech.lity.rea.skatolo.gui.controllers 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  Bang
      The Bang controller triggers an event when pressed.
      class  Button
      A button triggers an event after it has been release.
      class  Chart
      Use charts to display float array data as line chart, yet experimental, but see the skatolochart example for more details.
      class  FrameRate 
      class  HoverButton
      A button triggers an event after it has been release.
      class  HoverToggle
      a toggle can have two states, true and false, where true has the value 1 and false is 0.
      class  Knob
      A knob is a circular slider which can be used with a limited and unlimited range.
      class  Matrix
      A matrix is a 2d array with a pointer that traverses through the matrix in a timed interval. if an item of a matrix-column is active, the x and y position of the corresponding cell will trigger an event and notify the program. see the skatolomatrix example for more information.
      class  MultiList
      A Multilist is a multi-menu-tree controller. see the example for more information and how to use.
      class  MultiListButton
      Used by MultiList.
      class  Numberbox
      Click and drag the mouse inside a numberbox and move up and down to change the value of a numberbox.
      class  Range
      A range slider works just like a slider but can be adjusted on both ends.
      class  Slider
      A slider is either used horizontally or vertically. when adding a slider to skatolo, the width is compared against the height. if the width is bigger, you get a horizontal slider, is the height bigger, you get a vertical slider. a slider can have a fixed slider handle (one end of the slider is fixed to the left or bottom side of the controller), or a flexible slider handle (a handle you can drag).
      class  Slider2D
      The Slider2D allows to control a handle within a 2D area.
      class  Textfield
      A singleline input textfield, use arrow keys to go back and forth, use backspace to delete characters.
      class  Textlabel 
      class  Toggle
      a toggle can have two states, true and false, where true has the value 1 and false is 0.
